Articles.Content:
I am new to the game. I tried completing the 2nd scenario, where you have to avoid the Mun , and return home safely.

I managed to avoid the mun, and re-enter safely with a water landing. The scenario doesn't seem to finish at all though, unless I just quit to the main menu. I've included a screenshot below.

Is this normal? Or is the game suppose to show a scenario complete message? Did I miss something?

Thanks.

Scenarios don't really have a completion point in them yet. They're just premade sandbox modes at the moment so whenever you think you've finished it you can either keep playing or try a new one.

I'm sure in the future we'll see these be more like objectives in a career mode type setting with a traditional ending/reward system in place. Well at least I hope they end up like that

Also remember that in order to play the same scenario once again from the very beginning of it You need to restart it. It can be done in the scenarios menu. In the lower-left corner of the box is a restart button. It gets activated after choosing scenario that You've already played.
Put your mouse over the altimeter at the top center of the screen. It will move down exposing a 'recover vessel' button. Click it.
